attributes.action: Grant every willing family one hectare of land for the purposes of establishing thereon its own family  domain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royalty inherited huge areas of land, which was originally taken from the people of this land. freedom, free homeland is our birthright. Please give the land back.
Our generation has the opportunity of not only building a splendid country but of actually living in it, provided that there is goodwill among the legislative powers that be to grant every willing family 1 hectare of fertile land for the purposes of establishing thereon its own family domain within sustainable perma- culture eco-living principals. The land should be granted free of charge, for lifetime use, with the right of inheritance. The organic produce grown on these family domains are not subject to any form of taxation. The land is not close to the pollution of industry or roads. 
Details of the principals of the proposal can be found in the books series entitled The Ringing Cedars of Russia by Vladimir Megre.
